entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas late this evening and overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 20.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 29.
